_comment: TITAN V9.0 — Complete AI Module Assignment (57 task routes across 110+ modules)
_doc: 3 local Ollama models assigned to AI functions by capability. 25 new tasks added for full module coverage. Cloud providers available if API keys are set.

models._doc: Model capabilities: mistral=fast/general, qwen2.5=structured/JSON, deepseek-r1=deep reasoning

task_routing._doc: Maps AI function → best model. Each task uses the model whose strengths match the need.

bin_analysis._reason: Custom-tuned for structured BIN data extraction + JSON

detection_analysis._reason: Custom-tuned for detection root cause analysis

profile_audit._reason: Custom-tuned for structured profile quality analysis

copilot_guidance._reason: Custom-tuned for fast real-time operator guidance

preset_generation._reason: Custom-tuned for structured target preset JSON

bug_analysis._reason: Custom-tuned for code reasoning + patch suggestions

general_query._reason: Custom-tuned for fast Titan OS guidance

task_routing._v83_comment: V8.3 — 12 new detection vector sanitization tasks

fingerprint_coherence._reason: Cross-signal fingerprint validation needs structured analysis

identity_graph._reason: Identity plausibility needs structured demographic analysis

session_rhythm._reason: Session timing needs multi-factor strategic planning

navigation_path._reason: Navigation path generation needs fast creative output

card_rotation._reason: Card rotation needs strategic reasoning over decline history

form_fill_cadence._reason: Form fill timing needs fast behavioral parameter generation

velocity_schedule._reason: Velocity planning needs risk-aware strategic reasoning

avs_prevalidation._reason: AVS validation needs structured address format analysis

defense_tracking._reason: Defense change detection needs deep pattern reasoning

decline_autopsy._reason: Decline root cause analysis needs deep multi-factor reasoning

cross_session._reason: Cross-session pattern analysis needs strategic reasoning

task_routing._v90_comment: V9.0 — 25 new AI tasks for complete module coverage

copilot_abort_prediction._reason: Predict operation failure 30-60s before it happens from live session signals

live_target_scoring._reason: Real-time target vulnerability scoring based on latest decline patterns

detection_root_cause._reason: Deep reasoning over detection logs for root causes + module-specific patches

profile_optimization._reason: Optimize profile params (browser/OS/screen/locale) per specific target

persona_consistency_check._reason: Cross-validate all persona fields for internal consistency

trajectory_tuning._reason: Tune ghost_motor mouse dynamics per target antifraud engine (Forter/Riskified/Sift)

first_session_warmup_plan._reason: Plan targeted warmup to eliminate first-session bias (15% of failures)

card_target_matching._reason: Score card-to-target compatibility using historical success data

issuer_behavior_prediction._reason: Predict issuer ML scoring response to transaction params (35% of declines)

patch_reasoning._reason: Decide which patches to apply, predict effectiveness, validate results

operation_pattern_mining._reason: Discover hidden patterns in operation logs (time/BIN/target combos)

intel_prioritization._reason: Prioritize actionable intelligence from scraped feeds

history_pattern_planning._reason: Plan realistic 900-day browsing history tailored to persona + target

cookie_value_generation._reason: Generate realistic cookie values matching target site format

autofill_data_generation._reason: Generate matching saved form data for persona

kyc_strategy._reason: Optimal KYC bypass strategy per provider and challenge type

biometric_profile_tuning._reason: Adapt biometric params to match persona demographics vs BioCatch/BehaviorSec

tls_profile_selection._reason: Select optimal JA4 TLS profile per target CDN/WAF (Cloudflare/Akamai)

validation_strategy._reason: Choose optimal card validation method to avoid burning cards

detection_prediction._reason: Predict detection 30s before it happens using fraud score trajectory

intel_synthesis._reason: Synthesize web search results into structured operational intel

storage_pattern_planning._reason: Plan IndexedDB stores matching real user patterns per target

purchase_history_generation._reason: Generate realistic past purchase history for profile credibility

ga_event_planning._reason: Plan realistic GA event sequences matching client-side browsing

hardware_profile_coherence._reason: Validate USB/hardware tree matches claimed OS/hardware profile

app_model_map._doc: V9.0 — Complete model-to-app mapping with 57 AI tasks across 9 apps

titan_operations.why: Operations needs structured validation of personas, profiles, BINs, and V9 consistency checks

titan_intelligence.why: Intelligence is the brain — deep reasoning for strategy, real-time predictions, pattern mining, and intel synthesis

titan_network.why: Network uses AI for TLS profile selection per CDN/WAF + environment coherence

app_kyc.why: KYC needs strategic bypass planning per provider + persona validation

titan_admin.why: Admin powers the self-healing loop — detection analysis, patch reasoning, pattern mining

app_settings.why: Settings uses AI only for diagnostics queries

app_profile_forge.why: Profile Forge is the most AI-intensive app — generates, validates, and optimizes every aspect of identity

app_card_validator.why: Card Validator covers full card lifecycle — BIN analysis, target matching, issuer prediction, validation strategy

app_browser_launch.why: Browser Launch is mission-critical — preflight, warmup, biometrics, TLS, real-time detection prediction
